name: py-omegaconf
description:
A hierarchical configuration system, with support for merging
configurations from multiple sources (YAML config files,
dataclasses/objects and CLI arguments) providing a consistent API
regardless of how the configuration was created.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-runner
dependencies.description: Invoke py.test as distutils command with dependency resolution.

dependencies.name: py-antlr4-python3-runtime
dependencies.description:
This package provides runtime libraries required to use parsers
generated for the Python3 language by version 4 of ANTLR (ANother Tool
for Language Recognition).

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-dataclasses
dependencies.description: A backport of the dataclasses module for Python 3.6

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The IcedTea project provides a harness to build the source code from
http://openjdk.java.net using Free Software build tools and adds a
number of key features to the upstream OpenJDK codebase. IcedTea
requires an existing IcedTea or OpenJDK install to build.
